name: WebGLRenderingContext.isProgram
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.isProgram() method of the WebGL API returns true if the passed WebGLProgram is valid, false otherwise.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'isProgram' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.
